message.content:
cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.EC, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of designing group-strategyproof cost-sharing mechanisms, which is a topic in game theory and mechanism design. Therefore, cs.GT (Game Theory) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses conditions related to allocation and payments, which are topics in distributed systems (cs.DS) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also deals with approximation ratios, which is a topic in algorithmic game theory (cs.EC) and machine learning (cs.LG).
